version_description:
- Added battle tutorial for new players
- Added a hero collection screen, browse through the collection of your heroes and see all other unlockable ones
- Fixed and improved few UI elements, including idle rewards icon and team upgrade screen
- Other behind the scenes bug fixes and performance optimizations

- Meet the magical Fable Forest creatures, who now speak in 8 languages.
- Take part in exciting events, including a brand new one where you collect heroes of specific qualities and elements.
- Compete with other players, with direct championships in the grand opening of the arena.
- Enter the rich story, with immersive bosses who can now directly taunt and interact with you!
- Enjoy the game with newly added quality of life improvements and fixes.

- This update sets the stage for a brand new event which will be announced soon!
- Weâ€™ve made some quality of life improvements, changes in popups, tutorials, and animations
- Some bug fixes and translations fixes
